name: Tun Hole
description:
We formed a team of 7 thinking it would be ok because some of them said they were going to be a little bit busy during week days and free during the weekend LIES!! only me and meta were working and he was only on for 3 three hours a day during the week. filip was free during the mornings but he didnt know how to code and everton was our only hope , a star in a nightmare but only for a moment because he lives on the other side of the world..... .beanEXE not found. 

- bean / smallbean: Artist/Director/Music

- Metater: Code/Talk

- FilipTheDev: Unity Help/Emotional support

thus, The Golden Spork
